String.string: That's just a taste of TERA's true action combat. Buy the game today and keep the action coming!
Karascha is down, but evil still lurks in the dark corners of the world. Buy TERA today and explore dozens of action-packed zones!
You've punished the Cult of Lok, but their agents are everywhere. Don't let them win! Buy TERA today and keep fighting the good fight!
You've reached the highest level possible in the trial version of TERA. Buy the game today and keep those levels coming!

Welcome to TERA! Referred friends are automatically added to your friends list. Check your friends list by pressing [U]. You have some welcome gifts in the parcel post. Go to a "Banker" in a town and click "Parcel Post" to read mail and claim your presents.

Congratulations on reaching level 11! You are ready to venture outside the Island of Dawn. You have more presents in the parcel post. Go to a "Banker" in a town and click "Parcel Post" to claim your presents.

Congratulations on reaching level 30! You have more presents in the parcel post. You have reached the maximum level for a Refer-a-Friend account. To continue your adventure beyond level 30, please purchase the full game.
